blog.name: kin-kitchen
blog.title: Requests Closed
blog.description: Read the Guidlines before you request: https://kin-kitchen.tumblr.com/guidelines

title: Mollymauk Cupcakes
body:
I made these white chocolate raspberry cupcakes the other night and decorated them to be Mollymauk inspired. If I made them again, I’d make the cake part purple too. I meant to, but forgot lol.

I brushed gold luster dust on the raspberries, and gold sprinkles. I also used gold and white pearl sprinkles. 

The seedless raspberry filling, which is meant to reference Molly’s blood hunter class.

This is the tool I used to easily punch out holes in the cupcakes. No idea what it’s called though. 

Overall, they were good cupcakes, but I think I would add more white chocolate to the frosting, or find a different frosting recipe, the flavor was a bit lacking there. 

-Pink

description:
Beau doesn’t dream, and so these don’t count. [4950k. Gen (mostly). Post 2x34 speculation.]

She's wearing a blue hoodie.] Elizabeth, aka Birdie. 23. White. She/her. Linguistics grad student. Accessible content. Read my about for more info!

summary: Caduceus is totally oblivious to Pumat Sols crush on him.
question: Caduceus is totally oblivious to Pumat Sols crush on him.
answer:
This is the funniest headcanon that I’ve seen pop up over and over??? Like, Minnesotan nearly middle-aged city shopkeeper gets a crush on weird mid-twenties woodland graveyard hippie.

Caduceus is just completely checked out of the idea of romance and relationships, I think. He thinks of everyone in terms of friends or family. No matter what Pumat Sol said to him or did for him (if Pumat flirted at all it would be like… gifts and things like that imo), it would register as “oh! a friend! what a nice friend. I like this person.”

I like this person.”

I like this person.”

summary: Something about Taliesin’s whole Between the Sheets interview feels like having a nice drink with that long lost uncle you only...
body: Something about Taliesin’s whole Between the Sheets interview feels like having a nice drink with that long lost uncle you only ever hear about in stories and who seems to have life figured out and is actually giving you the best kinda stealth life advice to be happy and you’re like ‘oh, so this is the person in my family that gets it’ or ‘if they are alright, i’ll probably be fine too some day’

summary: I wonder how many Critical Role fans have become Dallas Cowboys fans (or just casually root for them) out of solidarity with...
body: I wonder how many Critical Role fans have become Dallas Cowboys fans (or just casually root for them) out of solidarity with Travis lol. I mean, I doubt any hardcore football fans who were already fans of another team would switch because of it. But people who weren’t invested in another team… any of y’all decide to start rooting for them because of Critical Role? I’ve been a Cowboys fan since birth so it makes me happy too lol.

summary: I know his strength is only “average” but Fjord is actually pretty fit. He has a +3 athletics because of his sailor background...
body: I know his strength is only “average” but Fjord is actually pretty fit. He has a +3 athletics because of his sailor background (it grants you proficiency) and a freaking +4 constitution. Yasha and Beau are still the most athletic, and Jester is freaking strong and pretty dexterous. But Fjord can hang somewhat lol.
